channel.title: The Old World on The Old World Journey
channel.description: Recent content in The Old World on The Old World Journey

item.title: Welcome to The Old World (and to my blog)
item.description: Admittedly, not the best picture, but you can still appreciate the artwork Hello, If you are reading this, then you have managed to stumble upon my quiet and possibly transient blog. Here I will be covering my journey into “The Old World” by Games Workshop. Basically, I only ever played a handful of Warhammer Fantasy games when I was in elementary school. I used to go to the GW store and participate in the Mega Battle Sundays; they had it structured so that people could come in and play store-hosted games with the store’s own models1.
